ygData.subject: Re: Guild name and charter
ygData.msgSnippet: Thats cool, but how do we know what poeple want?  are we going to ahve a vote? -joe
ygData.messageBody:
Thats cool, but how do we know what poeple want? are we going to ahve a
vote?

-joe

On Thu, 29 Jul 1999, David Lari wrote:

> From: David Lari <kerik@...>
>
> Yes, I'm starting to get to the point that I really don't care at all about
> the name. The important thing is having a guild and the advantages of it.
>
> Last night Kurt and his Bumpus character met up with my Dedric character on
> Brell and we helped each other out. We tried to get ruined wolf pelts so we
> can make size small patchwork for our guild members. And he helped collect
> bone chips for me to use for my Necro pet spells. And then I got an extra
> pair of shoes off an Orc Pawn and gave them to Bumpus since he didn't have
> any shoes. This is what I see as the advantage of the guild that will be
> universal to all the servers the guild is represented on.
>
> However, on the Brell Serilis server, we may wish to have a charter that
> emphasizes role playing more since it is a role playing server. So this
> aspect might not be shared among all the chapters.
>
> So, if any of you come over to gnome land, just look for Dedric and Bumpus.
> Also, we travel to Greater Faydark a bit too, so you Wood and High Elves
> give us a tell too.
>
> And hopefully we'll have some consensus on a name for the guild. At this
> point I am going to agree with whatever gets the most support from everyone
> else just so we can move on.
>
>
